summary: Various factions, including a half-breed bandit, a gang of homosexual cowboys and a priest, feud over stolen gold in a surreal town.
cast: Tomas Milian|Marilù Tolo|Piero Lulli|Milo Quesada|Francisco Sanz|Miguel Serrano|Ángel Silva|Sancho Gracia|Mirella Pamphili|Ray Lovelock|Roberto Camardiel|Patrizia Valturri|Calogero Azzaretto|Lars Bloch|Frank Braña|Sisto Brunetti|Ann Collin|Gene Collins|Quinto Gambi|Rafael Hernández|Antonio Pica|Herman Reynoso|Fernando Villena
title: Oro maldito
